name: Address Type
description: Codes specifying the type or purpose of an address for proper routing and context

values.definition: Primary residence where subject resides most of the time
Address specific to an organization or business
Work address specific to the subject
Retained for backward compatibility as of v2.6
Address where correspondence will reach subject
Retained for backward compatibility as of v2.6
May be used for credit card validation
Address for shipping goods and deliveries
Address specific to subject's legal status
Retained for backward compatibility as of v2.6
Home address at time of birth
Pneumatic tube address for hospital delivery systems

vendorVariations.epic: Supports standard codes with additional internal address categories
vendorVariations.cerner: Standard implementation with validation for common address types
vendorVariations.allscripts: Supports primary codes (H, B, O, M, P)

generationRules.realistic: Home addresses are most common, followed by business/office addresses for providers
